name: Simon and Baxter
body:
#Welcome to "Simon and Baxter".
This is a game inspired in Zork, an original and characteristic adventure game in which you can only interact writing.

Here is a [link](http://iplayif.com/?story=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ifarchive.org%2Fif-archive%2Fgames%2Fzcode%2Fzdungeon.z5) to this game.

#The adventure begins...
Itâ€™s a cold and dark winter night. Suddenly, Simon wakes up because of a very strange and loud noise coming from under his bed. He is worried about that phenomenon and decides to take a look. He observes a magic portal on the floor and he starts to be attracted by an extraordinary force. Finally, Simon goes through the portal and he appears in a new world. Once there, he finds a magical staff called Baxter, and they start an unforgettable adventure together.
